DOCNAME: CASE OF GAVRILYAK AND OTHERS v. UKRAINE
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time);Violation of Article 13 - Right to an effective remedy (Article 13 - Effective remedy)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The list of applicants and the relevant details of the applications are set out in the appended table .
CARDINAL . The applicants complained of the excessive length of civil proceedings and of the lack of any effective remedy in domestic law .
